Key Match Events: Pete Alonso hit a three-run home run in the ninth inning to save the Mets’ season and send New York to the Division Series
Pre-Game Insights: Mets manager Carlos Mendoza maintained faith in Pete Alonso and said, 'We’re waiting for that one swing. Hopefully today is the day'
Post-Match Reflections: Pete Alonso said, 'Words can’t explain. This is unreal.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mets' owner Steve Cohen attempted to construct a couple of sentences. 'Great players, they come through in the clutch, right?'
Others: The Mets advanced to the Division Series against the Philadelphia Phillies starting Saturday afternoon
